thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: After choosing and confirming my flight. I reviewed ,then price I was paying showed so I finished the process. All of a sudden an extra 77$ added to my invoice for many life insurance I did not accept and had to call flight hub to reverse this transaction which I was told will take 6-8 weeks. This happened last time with a booking. Not pleased at all. This extra charge is added somehow after accepting the final bill and then confirming the booking.
